headline.main: Patience, for Now, With Flow of Information

lead_paragraph: Like many Americans, Kathleen M. Payne feels the government is telling her everything she needs to know about the war on terrorism. For now.
abstract: Most Americans feel comfortable with amount of information Bush administration is providing on war on terrorism, at least for now; say administraton has effectively prepared them for lengthy and unconventional conflict and has stirred enough patriotic fervor to build substantial support for its efforts; photos (M)
snippet: Like many Americans, Kathleen M. Payne feels the government is telling her everything she needs to know about the war on terrorism.    For now....
